name: Flytech Aviation Academy
about: Flytech Aviation Academy, located at Nadargul Airfield in Hyderabad, India, is the country's largest aviation training facility. Established in 1995 and approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA), the academy offers comprehensive courses in Commercial Pilot License (CPL) and Aircraft Maintenance Engineering (AME). Founded by Capt. Mamatha, the first lady Chief Flying Instructor of India, Flytech boasts a fleet of 15 aircraft, including Cessna 152 and Cessna 172S, and utilizes advanced simulators like the ATC 610 and ATC 810. The academy provides state-of-the-art facilities, including libraries, IT services, and career development support. With a strong focus on academic excellence and partnerships with international aeronautical universities, Flytech is dedicated to training the next generation of aviation professionals to meet the industry's growing demands.
